The repeated failed attempts to make Index remember her after each memory erasure resulted in her cold personality as Kaori began to accept that no matter how much a person tries, no one can change their destiny. She begins to show a kinder side to herself after Touma saves Index (thus giving her hope that anyone can defy their destiny) and gradually falls in love with him after he helps her face her past with the Amakusa Catholics, becoming more prone to showing emotion and sometimes showing a little embarrassment if she is with him. She is the protagonist of her own spin-off mini light novel bundled with the Toaru Kagaku no Railgun DVDs. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Tsukuyomi Komoe
character.description: Despite her childish and very short (135 cm) appearance, she is actually an adult and one of Touma`s teachers. This is proven by her apartment being littered with beer cans and cigarettes. She also contradicts her age by acting childish to her students, having a child-like crush on Touma, and ending her sentences with desu, something a child usually does. This irony means that she is often regarded as one of the seven great mysteries of Academy City.

character.name: Stiyl Magnus
character.description: A sorcerer from Necessarius. His sorcery name is Fortis931. He is an extremely heavy smoker; he claims a world without nicotine would be hell. He specializes in using flames and is able to use a flame sword or summon a 3000 degree Celsius fire called Innocentius to battle his enemies. Despite his looks, he is actually fourteen years old and is physically weak. He has a short temper but is actually kind, as he cares about Index very much and his failure to save her life without losing her memories was his greatest regret.

character.name: Aleister Crowley
character.description: Once the greatest magician in modern magic history, more than half of all modern magicians are affected by this man`s established theories, and two-fifths of them are direct followers of his ways. Having stretched the boundaries of sorcery farther than the advances made in the last few millenia alone and written many top-class spellbooks like The Book of the Law, it is no surprise that many mages were outraged when this eccentric genius literally "dumped" all his magic abilities and decided to "ace it" in the field of science, thus establishing the http://anidb.net/ch34367 [Academy City] and becoming its hidden monarch. When he chose to stop using magic and was running for his life from a hoard of enraged stalker magicians, he met the http://anidb.net/ch14534 [Heaven Canceller], who eventually helped him found Academy City in a far-eastern island of Japan and also provides help in this ex-magician`s new goal; to extend his lifespan for as long as possible by having all but his consciousness rely on the power of machines.

character.name: Uiharu Kazari
character.description: Uiharu Kazari is Shirai`s friend and colleague in Judgment and another protagonist in To Aru Kagaku no Railgun. Shy and humble, she goes to a different middle school from Shirai and is known for wearing a headband made of flowers on her head, and sometimes a surgical mask as she constantly suffers the flu. Her powers are currently unknown. She makes a cameo appearance in the opening of the anime and is set to appear in the animated Railgun spinoff. She has enormous eyebrows.

character.name: Accelerator
character.description: Accelerator is the most powerful Psychic in Academy City. His real name is unknown, though Accelerator recalls his surname was composed of two characters and his given name consisted of three characters. First appearing as an antagonist, he later becomes a main character and the lead of the science side in the Toaru Majutsu no Index series. Because Accelerator has been this reflexively powerful since childhood, he was unstoppable even when the military was sent to kill him. However, these past influences resulted in his inability to trust others and he was left alone. After meeting Touma, he develops a sense of admiration and jealousy towards Touma`s heroism and ability to help others, contrasting with how Accelerator feels he is only able to destroy. A sadistic boy about the same age as Touma, he has an ability called Vector Change, a form of telekinesis allowing him to change the vector values of anything he touches. This ability allows Accelerator perform feats such as reversing the blood flow inside a person`s body, increasing the wind velocity around him to create a massive plasma storm, and blocking sound. His ability is automatic, which means that he must consciously allow gravity to affect him and that his body blocks all ultraviolet radiation, resulting his albino appearance (white hair and pale skin) because his body is unable to make melanin. The automatic nature of Redirection also prevents the use of projectiles (like bullets) and explosives (like bombs) against him. After being shot by http://anidb.net/ch14551 [Amai Ao], Accelerator`s ability to use his power is hindered, but slowly recovers with the help of http://anidb.net/ch14534 [Heaven Canceller] and the http://anidb.net/ch14538 [Misaka Network]. However, he is forced to use a cane and is restricted to using his ability for only 15 minutes at a time, as well as losing more than half of his computation ability even with 10,000 sisters doing calculations for him. Accelerator`s unique ability make him the subject of an experiment attempting to create the first Level 6 psychic; according to the city`s best supercomputer, Tree Diagram (which was unprecedentedly destroyed by Index`s Dragon Breath), this feat could only be achieved by killing 128 skilled Level 5 psychics without a single failure. Since there are only six other known Level 5s in Academy City, an alternative plan was formed to level up Accelerator by having him kill 20,000 skilled Level 2 psychics: the Misaka clones. He willingly joins the experiment to gain a reputation as the most powerful and feared psychic that no one would be foolish enough to challenge and even killed many who got in his way. The Sisters` memories of his behavior during the experiment may suggest that he is, in a way, a pacifist; since his power won`t disappear, the only way he sees to stop fighting is to be so strong and sadistic that no one would raise a finger against him. He even seems to attempt to frighten the Sisters or otherwise encourage them to refuse the battle. Mikoto tries to stop the experiment to save her sisters, but it is Touma who finally does so and defeats Accelerator after discovering his weakness: Accelerator was physically weak because of his total reliance on his powers. Overconfidence in his psychic abilities resulted in his defeat as Touma beat him with his Imagine Breaker and street-fighting skills. After his defeat, he reappears later and takes a more heroic role protecting a girl named Last Order, the last Misaka clone. In the aftermath of the incident, Accelerator is shot in the head by Amai Ao, damaging his brain and severely limiting the use of his power.

character.name: Yomikawa Aiho
character.description: A teacher at Touma`s school and a friend of Komoe. She is beautiful, has glamorous proportions, and is always seen with a green jersey. She is a member of the Anti-Skills and cares deeply for her students, and is apparently an active peacekeeper within the Academic City. A favor to her old friend, Yomikawa is asked by Yoshikawa Kikyou to take care of Accelerator and Last Order after they are released from the hospital.

character.name: Sphynx
character.description: Sphinx is Index`s pet kitten she cares for due to her caring nature. She first finds Sphinx in volume two inside a box. Toma tries to convince her that she cannot keep it due to the dorm he is at does not allow pets, but they manage to pull it off without anyone suspecting them.

character.name: Tsuchimikado Motoharu
character.description: A blonde teenager who is always seen with sunglasses and wearing an Aloha shirt. He is a friend and classmate of Touma who just happens to be his next-door neighbor at the dormitory they`re staying at. While he seem like a normal, average teenager, there`s more to him than meets the eye. Secretly, Tsuchimikado is actually a former agent of Necessarius who became a freelance spy for Necessarius, Academy City, and other unknown organizations; the leaders of both Necessarius and Academy City are both aware of this but have decided to let him be for the time being. His sorcery name is Fallere825, `the back-stabber`. He was formerly a skilled Onmyouji as his family are descendants of Abe no Seimei but gave up his abilities when he went under the ESP development curriculum. He has a younger step-sister named Maika, whom he is also in love with, and for this he is known as the Shisukon Gunsou (シスコン軍曹, "Sis-com Sergeant"). He is also a member of one of Academy City`s secret organizations, the "GROUP". His ESP ability is the Level 0 Auto Regeneration (肉体再生, Nikutai Saisei, lit. "Body Regeneration"). Due to this power, he can still use magic as he can repair the damage done to his body, making him the only successful psychic/magician hybrid. Despite these advantages, he avoids using magic except in the most desperate situations as he cannot avoid the extreme pain caused by using it.

character.name: Aogami Pierce
character.description: His real name is unknown. Touma`s friend and classmate. A funny individual who tends to see Touma`s bad luck, who he calls "Kami-yan" in a different way. He is a self-confessed pervert, lolicon, and masochist who enjoys being punished by his teacher, Tsukuyomi. He is always seen with Motoharu. He, Motoharu, and Touma are known as the three idiots in their class as not only do they have the lowest test scores, but they are also Level 0s (except the latter two have good reasons for being that way).

character.name: Etzali
character.description: An Aztecan sorcerer. He borrows the appearance of Unabara Mitsuki, the Tokiwadai Middle School principal`s grandson. A certain group outside Academy City became aware of the growing "Kamijou Faction", so they sent him as a spy. Borrowing the appearance of Mitsuki, he attempts to become closer to Misaka Mikoto, but he ends up falling in love with her. After he loses the battle with Touma, he makes him promise to protect Mikoto and the world around her. He uses a copy of the obsidian spearhead of the god Tlahuizcalpantecuhtli, which reflects light from Venus destroying anything the light falls upon. It is later revealed that he is member of the GROUP.

character.name: Kaeru Kao no Ishi
character.description: The "Heaven Canceller". Often mentioned as "the Frog-Faced Doctor" by http://anidb.net/ch2342 [Kamijou Touma], he is an exceptionally-gifted and benevolent physician who can cure any illness and heal any injury, even if it is terminal. He is only unable to heal specific brain-related injuries, such as the "Imagine-Breaker Boy`s" damaged memories and http://anidb.net/ch10527 [Accelerator]`s computation ability; however, in the latter case, he was able to configure Accelerator to control his powers with support from the Misaka Network. This medical genius also manages the life extension devices for the ruler of http://anidb.net/ch34367 [Academy City], http://anidb.net/ch2731 [Aleister Crowley], while also supporting the foundation of the city itself.

character.name: Tsuchimikado Maika
character.description: Motoharu`s younger step-sister. She wears a maid attire (as she goes to a Maid School) and rides on top of a cleaning `bot. She has a friendly relationship with Touma and knows that he has two girls (Index and Aisa) living with him but keeps the secret between her and Touma and is a good friend of Mikoto as she works at her school. Even though she lives in her school`s dormitory, she sometimes goes to live at her brother`s apartment; for instance, in episode ten, she stays at said residence because her dormitory`s air conditioner breaks down.

character.name: Misaka Imouto
character.description: Introduced in both the third volume of the novel and manga, respectively, and episode ten of the anime, Touma meets the younger `twin sister` of Mikoto who he calls Misaka`s sister (御坂妹, Misaka Imouto), who seems rather quiet and emotionless. Her voice is rather monotonous and computer-like. Her speech pattern is unique, for she talks in third person (adding a description of herself after she finishes talking). While both sisters may look alike from a distance, Misaka has paler eyes and wears striped panties under her skirt. Misaka also wears a special set of goggles that enables her to see electron beams and magnetic field lines for the reason that, unlike Mikoto, she does not have that ability. At the beginning of the third volume, Mikoto seems to dislike and worry about Misaka for some reason, and later events reveal why. In reality, Misaka imouto is a clone of Mikoto; in fact, the first one Touma meets is No. 10032 out of 20,000 other clones (excluding Full-Tuning and Last Order) copied from Mikoto called `The Sisters`. Even though they have a weaker variant of Mikoto`s electric abilities (Level 3), the Sisters` minds are connected by a special psychic ability called Radio Noise (欠陥電気, Kekkan Denki?, "Flawed Electric"), which enables their brainwaves to become electric signals; this allows them to share their thoughts and memories within their communication network, also known as the Misaka Network. Being rapidly-manufactured clones, the Sisters rarely change their facial expression because they did not learn how to. Due to minds having connected to the Misaka Network, most of the Sisters never considered themselves human yet some of them had slight difference in personalities. 20,000 clones were created in total, to be used in an experiment designed to create the first Level 6 psychic ("Level 6 Shift"), Accelerator. By the time of third novel, 10,031 were killed in the experiment. After the Level 6 Shift experiment fails, all 9969 surviving Sisters are ordered back to the research center where they were created to have "readjustments" so that they will have normal life spans. The Sisters later began showing their owned unique personalities to differentiate themselves after learning how to `disconnect` from the Network and keeping their own private memories inaccessible to the others in the Network. Misaka 10032, also known as Misaka Imouto, is the most prominent clone that is most featured in the series. She is known for having a soft spot for cats which she herself has a pet black kitten. She was the first sister clone that Touma met. Due to the many interactions she had with him, 10032 wonder why she thought about him so much. Misaka 10032 was Accelerator`s latest target in the Level 6 experiment, but Touma managed to stop him before he killed her. Confused, she asks him why he did so since she was a clone, to which he replied that even though she was a clone, she was still an individual with a life. His words (along with Mikoto`s) affect her so much that she and the Sisters decide to help Touma by controlling all of the city`s wind turbines to prevent Accelerator from creating a plasma storm. After the Level 6 experiment was canceled, she was one of ten Sisters to stay in Academy City while the rest went overseas around the world for treatment. She later falls in love with Touma and receives a necklace from him (he bought it for her during his date with Mikoto and mistook 10032 for Mikoto) which she treasures.

character.name: Sisters
character.description: Introduced in both the third volume of the novel and manga, respectively, and episode ten of the anime, http://anidb.net/ch2342 [Touma] meets the younger twin sister of http://anidb.net/ch2469 [Mikoto] who he calls Misaka`s sister (御坂妹, Misaka Imouto), who seems rather quiet and emotionless. Her voice is rather monotonous and computer-like. Her speech pattern is unique, for she talks in third person (adding a description of herself after she finishes talking). While both sisters may look alike from a distance, Misaka has paler eyes and wears striped panties under her skirt. Misaka also wears a special set of goggles that enables her to see electron beams and magnetic field lines for the reason that, unlike Mikoto, she does not have that ability. At the beginning of the third volume, Mikoto seems to dislike and worry about Misaka for some reason, and later events reveal why. In reality, Misaka Imouto is a clone of Mikoto; in fact, the first one Touma meets is No. 10032 out of 20,000 other clones (excluding Full-Tuning and http://anidb.net/ch14550 [Last Order]) copied from Mikoto called The Sisters. Even though they have a weaker variant of Mikoto`s electric abilities (Level 3), the Sisters` minds are connected by a special psychic ability called Radio Noise (欠陥電気), which enables their brainwaves to become electric signals; this allows them to share their thoughts and memories within their communication network, also known as the Misaka Network. Being rapidly-manufactured clones, the Sisters rarely change their facial expression because they did not learn how to. Due to minds having connected to the Misaka Network, most of the Sisters never considered themselves human yet some of them had slight difference in personalities. 20,000 clones were created in total, to be used in an experiment designed to create the first Level 6 psychic ("Level 6 Shift"), Accelerator. By the time of third novel, 10,031 were killed in the experiment. After the Level 6 Shift experiment fails, all 9969 surviving Sisters are ordered back to the research center where they were created to have "readjustments" so that they will have normal life spans. The Sisters later began showing their owned unique personalities to differentiate themselves after learning how to disconnect from the Network and keeping their own private memories inaccessible to the others in the Network.

character.name: Sasha Croitsef
character.description: Sasha Croitsef is a battle nun of Annihilatus, who first appears in the fourth novel and in the anime episode Angel Fall. She carries around a bunch of unique weapons, from hammers to saws. During the events of the Angel Fall spell, her body was accidentally switched to the Archangel Gabriel, which prompted the archangel to find the caster of the spell using Sasha`s body under the alias Misha Croitsef. Sasha later appears as herself in the following novels and the second anime season.

character.name: Unabara Mitsuki
character.description: The Tokiwadai Middle School principal`s grandson, a level 4. Seemingly romantically interested in Misaka. It is later revealed that Mitsuki`s place was in reality taken by Etzali, an Aztecan sorcerer who planned to place mistrust between Touma and his friends and allies. However, the real Mitsuki appeared and his cover was blown.

character.name: Last Order
character.description: Last Order is the name of http://anidb.net/ch2469 [Misaka Mikoto]`s No. 20001 clone. She is the administrator of the http://anidb.net/ch14538 [Misaka Network] and the fail-safe mechanism in case the Sisters got out of control. She is not designed to function independently and survive for long outside a culture container and appears to be only about ten years old. Due to intercepting an emotion program http://anidb.net/ch55166 [Nunotaba Shinobu] intended to install into all of the clones, she is capable of showing emotions unlike the other sisters and has a close relationship with Mikoto, http://anidb.net/ch14537 [Misaka Imouto], http://anidb.net/ch10527 [Accelerator] and her adult guardians, http://anidb.net/ch13691 [Yomikawa Aiho] and http://anidb.net/ch14552 [Yoshikawa Kikyou]. Like her older clone sisters, she speaks in third person with a description, except she says "Misaka" twice. She has all of the memories of the Misaka clones and has observed Accelerator through this method, posing a theory that Accelerator did not actually want to do the Level 6 Shift experiment. Accelerator meets Last Order when she follows him home one day after he fends off a bunch of street thugs hearing of his defeat against a Level 0. Though Accelerator tries to dissuade her from hanging around him, she persists in following him around because she wants someone to keep her company. She is later kidnapped by http://anidb.net/ch14551 [Amai Ao] so he can infect the Misaka clones to possibly go on a rampage and attack people. Accelerator manages to stop him but gets injured in the process. Last Order and Accelerator are put under the care of Aiho after the incident. Accelerator does all he can to protect her since she is the first person in his life who requested his help. Throughout the story, she remains with Accelerator and has been involved in situations relating to him. After Accelerator`s confrontation with Aiwass, she is left in critical condition. However, Accelerator brings Last Order with him to Russia in hopes of finding http://anidb.net/ch870 [Index], who may have the knowledge to cure her.

character.name: Yoshikawa Kikyou
character.description: Academy City`s researcher. She was in charge of the "Level 6 Shift" project. Even after the project was put to a stop, she kept herself in the laboratory, creating a vaccine for the virus program that Ao Amai put in Last Order. She is shot by Amai while trying to protect Accelerator and Last Order but recovers and is later released from the hospital along with Accelerator and Last Order.

character.name: Sherry Cromwell
character.description: Her sorcery name Intimus115, "Everything I offer to my lost friend". A member of Necessarius and a talented "Decoder", she has tanned skin and wears a black Gothic Lolita dress. Her blonde hair is unkempt and according to Tsuchimikado, she has the silhouette of a lion. She is a master of Kabbalah Statue art and utilizes oil pastel or chalk to draw a spell to summon a golem Sherry refers to as "Ellis". Sherry appears in Academy City with the intention of attacking a person of importance to either Academy City or Necessarius in order to cause a conflict- and eventually, war- between the two factions. During her assault, she reveals to Toma that she seeks to keep science and magic divided as revenge for her late friend Ellis, an esper from Academy City. Ellis was involved in a secret experiment between Academy City and Necessarius in an attempt to create the first magician-esper hybrid. But it went horribly wrong as not only did the espers participants suffered major injuries from magic but were killed by the Knights of England as the experiment was illegal under the truce between Science and Magic. Blaming both sides for letting Ellis suffered and killed, Sherry swore revenge against them by making them suffered like she did.

character.name: Kazakiri Hyouka
character.description: She is Index`s first "friend" in Academy City. She is gentle but shy. Not much is known about her aside from the fact that she was an overachiever at Kirigaoka Academy for Girls (霧ヶ丘女学院, Kirigaoka Jyogakuin), according to Aisa. Her ability is Counter Stop (正体不明, Shoutai Fumei, "Unknown Identity"). Details about her level are unknown but it could be high, since it was mentioned that she was among the top psychics in the Kirigaoka Academy for Girls. It is later revealed that she is not a human at all but instead an algorithm of the psychic`s AIM with a conscious. The nature of her being leads her to be indestructible, as she can recreate any damage done to her body and lift objects several times her size. When not physically manifested, she exists in a realm she calls `the city of shimmers`, a warped shadow of Gakuen Toshi.

character.name: Laura Stuart
character.description: The Archbishop of Necessarius. Despite being the Archbishop, she looks like an eighteen-year-old girl with long blonde hair; other than that, any other details about her are unknown. She speaks funny Japanese, courtesy of Tsuchimikado teaching her. She might sound simple and irresponsible, but behind her smile lies a cold and calculating personality. She loves baths and has a collection of the latest bath accessories from Academy City.

character.name: Lucia
character.description: Lucia is a member of the Anieze Forces. She appears to have a serious nature. Lucia uses a large carriage wheel as focus of her magic, the wheel based on the legend of Catherine of Alexandria.

character.name: Agnese Sanctis
character.description: Agnese Sanctis is the former leader of the Anieze Forces, a group of Battle Nuns for the Catholic Church. She is first seen in Volume 7 in search of Orsola. She wields lotus wand, which is her main form of magic. She wears platform shoes to compensate for her small stature.

character.name: Orsola Aquinas
character.description: Orsola Aquinas is a blond, blue eye Necessarius nun from Italy and a skilled decoder. She was originally a famous Roman Catholic nun, but was marked for death when it was revealed she was able to decrypt the Liber AL vel Legis, a grimoire containing dangerous magic. Unknown to the Church, Orsola`s attempt to decrypt the grimoire was in order to destroy the book itself. Fearing for her life, she sought the protection of the Amakusa Catholics, but ran away from them as well as she didn`t trust them and feared they wanted the knowledge of the grimoire. After meeting Touma, she learns that both he and Amakusas were genuinely want to help her and rejoins them as battle nuns from the Catholic Church arrive to assassinate her. However, when they discover Orsola was never capable of deciphering the grimoire at all, the Catholic Church calls off the order to eliminate her and Necessarius grants her sanctuary.

character.name: Angelene
character.description: Angelene is a nun of the Anieze Forces and Luccia`s partner. Angelene and Luccia as a pair is almost always with Anieze after the Queen of Adriatic incident. She is slightly shorter than her partner with longer, braided hair. She seems to be quite shy in contrast to her partner, though her personality at times can be childish, and she does get angry. She has a real sweet tooth for various deserts and sweet drinks. Her magic revolves around a bag she carries around, which is reference to a passage in Matthew`s Gospel and gold.

character.name: Tatemiya Saiji
character.description: Currently the substitute-Supreme Pontiff of the Amakusa Catholics. He has impressionable pitch-black hair and a unique sense of fashion. He wears an over-sized shirt and his shoe laces are one meter long. He is an expert in Amakusa-style combat and is equipped with a 180-centimeter-long Flamberge. In terms of personality, he`s similar to Touma. He doesn`t need a reason to save people, which resulted in him attempting to help Ursula. This was due to him wanting to rebuild the Amakusa Church into something that can be called a home to Kanzaki Kaori again, so she doesn`t need to leave them again to protect them from getting involved in incidents due to her powers of a saint.

character.name: Itsuwa
character.description: Itsuwa is an Amakusa Catholic girl. Originally introduced in the 11th novel, she makes an earlier appearance in the anime episode http://anidb.net/e122298 [The Book of the Law] which is based on the beginning of the 7th novel. In the 11th novel, she fell in love with Touma after their first meeting, claiming it was Love at first sight but the anime suggests she fell for him much earlier during the Orsola incident in the 7th novel. However due to her shyness, she is unable to properly tell him how she feels. Yet she hopes to get Touma`s attention, even when knowing her senpai and superior Kaori is also in love with him. She has accompanied Touma and his friends on more than one occasion, including traveling with him to Italy, France, and Britain. In the events of the 16th novel she becomes his bodyguard and caretaker. When Acqua first attacks Academy City, she fails to protect him and unsuccessfully tries to heal him with magic due to his Imagine Breaker. After Touma is sent to the hospital she goes into despair for failing to protect him but Saiji rebukes her and tells her to snap out of it as she focus on fighting with Acqua if she wants to protect him. During the Amakusas rematch against Aqua, Itsuwa suddenly displays a change of personality, becomes full of tranquil fury that even the way she spoke changed. She performed a Saint Destroyer spell in that battle, harming Acqua and causing him to lose the Divine Mother`s Mercy spell which allows them to defeat him. Her weapon is a Friulian Spear which by adding layers of reinforcement magic, turns it into a symbol of a `Thousand Years Tree`, which symbolizes the growth of plants and makes certain magic spells to be more potent over time. She also can perform Nanasen (七閃, Seven Flash) by manipulating her spear and steel wires just like Kaori. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Musujime Awaki
character.description: Musujime Awaki is a sophomore attending Kirigaoka Academy for Girls. She is a Level 4 esper with a teleport ability called Move Point (座標移動, Zahyou Idou). Her teleportation powers are more powerful than Kuroko as she can teleport anything weighing up to 4,500kg without even touching it by a distance up to 800 meters. However, due to a past trauma where she miscalculated and teleported her leg inside a wall, accidentally tearing her leg skin and muscles out from the wall and almost dying, she has a fear of using her powers on herself and feels physically ill whenever she is forced to teleport herself. This fear prevents her from becoming a Level 5. She steals a remnant of the destroyed Tree Diagram and confronts Kuruko and Mikoto. However, she is beaten by Accelerator and the remnant is destroyed. Awaki is one of the guides to the windowless building where Aleister Crowley resides. She is also living with Tsukuyomi Komoe. Later, she is blackmailed to join team Group.

character.name: Lidvia Lorenzetti
character.description: Lidvia Lorenzetti is a catholic nun who first appears in the 9th and 10th novels. She has the ability to convert people to Christianity regardless of who they are, criminals, non-believers, or other magicians that share no connection with the Church. She attempts to convert Academy City to Catholics with the help of an artifact called Pietro`s Cross but fails and is captured by Necessarius. She reappears in the 14th novel, being interrogated by Stiyl over God`s Right Seat goals.

character.name: Oriana Thomson
character.description: Oriana Thomson is a blond english sorceress who works as a mercenary. Her sorcery name is Basis104, from the foundation to carry. Her physical appearance is that of a beauty with a rather attractive figure, which makes most women around her jealous. She first appears during the Academy City Sports festival, for which she was hired by the Vatican for a special mission. She is later hired by Necessarius to help them investigate the source of the Euro Tunnel explosion.

character.name: Fukiyose Seiri
character.description: Fukiyose Seiri is Touma`s classmate, Aisa`s best friend, often takes up roles of the class representative even though it`s Aogami`s the class representative. She dislikes people (namely Touma) who give up on their life and blame it on bad luck. It`s debatable if she is tsundere towards Touma or only dislikes him because of his attitude towards life and school in general but for sure she does have a sort of friendly relationship with him, even sometimes playing a role of tsukkomi for Touma who acts as the boke. She is mentioned as the girl who is "pretty but lacks sex appeal". She is a health-product freak and is frequently ordering different health products from the television shopping channels.

character.name: Necessarius
character.description: Necessarius is the secret magical branch of the Church of England. Officially named the Church of Necessary Evil, the organization was started by Puritans who despise the use of magic in England and sought to destroy it by using magic themselves but now the organization no longer has an anti-magic stance and supports magic. Officially, Necessarius is under the authority of the Archbishop of Canterbury but the current leader and Archbishop of Necessarius secretly controls the Archbishop of Canterbury thus Necessarius is the true power behind the Anglican Church. As one of the three magic powers of Britain, Necessarius represent the religious magic community. Necessarius is currently led by Archbishop Laura Stuart.

character.name: Amakusashiki Juuji Seikyou
character.description: The Amakusa Catholics are a secret order of Japanese warriors. The order was formed during the Edo period when Japan banned Christianity. In order to escape persecution, they merge Shintoism and Buddhism into their Catholic beliefs to hid their religion which led the Amakusa`s creating a unique fusion of magic. While skilled magicians, the Amakusa`s are also skilled with martial arts and fighting in groups. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Biagio Buzoni
character.description: Biagio Buzoni is an elderly Catholic bishop who is introduced in the 11 volume. He is in charge of overseeing the remodeling of a powerful magical weapon known as the Queen of the Adriatic Sea.

character.name: Matthai Reese
character.description: The head of the Catholic Church and a friend and a former disciple of Fiamma of the Right before becoming Pope. When the magic world learns of the existence of Touma and his powers, Fiamma convinces the Pope that Touma and his powers are a threat to the world, where the Pope declares Touma is a heretic that must be eliminated. When the Pope later learns that Fiamma had manipulated him all this time, Fiamma casts a powerful spell to destroy the Vatican, but the Pope manages to divert the spell onto himself to save the city. After his hospitalization and quelling a succession crisis at the Vatican, he heads to Russia in order to stop Fiamma`s plans.

character.name: Zenpou no Vento
character.description: Vento is a member of God`s Right Seat. Blessed with the nature of The Flame of God (Uriel). Her face is heavily pierced and at its top, she puts on heavy make-up. When she was a child, she went with her brother to an amusement park, and an accident occurred in which her brother died; thus, she grew up with a deep hatred against science and technology. She uses the spell Divine Punishment, which takes away the consciousness of anyone who has any evil intentions towards her. She also utilizes hammers made of air to bludgeon her opponent. Appearing first in the 11th novel, later in the 12th novel, she invades Academy City and causing havoc there in order to kill Touma but fails due to Hyouka in FUSE=Kazakiri mode and Amata Kihara`s intervention. She is defeated by Touma but was rescued by Acqua. Vento later returns during the Third World War to hunt down Fiamma for betraying the Vatican.

character.name: Kami no Useki
character.description: God`s Right Seat is a secret magical organization within the http://anidb.net/ch26157 [Roman Catholic Church]. Referred to as the true dark side of the Roman Catholic Church by http://anidb.net/ch101834 [Leivinia Birdway], they are a group composed of powerful magicians aligned with the four Archangels. Source: Toaru Wiki

character.name: Kouhou no Acqua
character.description: Acqua is a member of God`s Right Seat. A former mercenary for the Anglican Church and an old friend of the current Grand Master of the Knights of England, Acqua`s true name is William Orwell. His sorcery name is Flere210, The one who changes the reason of tears. Blessed with the nature of The Power of God (Gabriel), Acqua converted to Catholicism and joined God`s Right Seat after leaving the Anglican Church. Unlike the other members of God`s Right Seat, he is not corrupt and does not ignore the opinions of the Pope. As a sorcerer, he cannot use spells that are used by normal sorcerers, but has been blessed with the spell Divine Mother`s Mercy, which nullifies the liabilities of certain special spells, allowing him to perform powerful spells under unfit conditions. He is a Saint, which endows him with super-human capabilities, including the strength to carry weapons twice as large as him; with Divine Mother`s Mercy nullifies the limitations of his body, he is able to use 100% of the capabilities offered to him as a Saint. As such, he demonstrates a considerable gap between his abilities and that of Kaori who is also a Saint. After his defeat in hands of the Amakusa Catholics and Touma in the volume 16, where he loses the Divine Mother`s Mercy, he returns in volume 17 in England wielding a replica of the dragon slayer sword, Ascalon, during the Magic Civil War as an ally of Princess Villian and Necessarius and fights his former friend and comrade, the Grand Master of the Knights of England. Acqua later heads to Russia, in order to stop Fiamma`s plans; on the way meets and saves Shiage and Rikou from a group of mercenaries. He ends up helping Accelerator and Hyouka against Archangel Gabriel and weakens Gabriel by absorbing its powers.

character.name: Vasilissa
character.description: Vasilissa is Sasha`s superior. Named after a heroine of Russian folklore, Sasha does not like her due to Vassilisa`s sometimes childish behavior, her vanity relating to skin health care, and her weird interest in Japanese otaku culture, which she unsuccessfully tries to get Sasha interested. During the Third World War between Russia and Academy City, she betrays Annihilatus to prevent them from using Sasha and hands her over to Vento, while she stays behinds to hold off Annihilatus and Fiamma`s subordinates.

character.name: Sahou no Terra
character.description: Sahou no Terra is a member of God`s Right Seat. Blessed with the nature of God`s Medicine (Raphael). A small, menacing-looking old man wearing a green robe. Touma and Itsuwa encountered him when they went to France. He uses the spell Execution of Light, which can manipulate the hierarchy of everything around him. He also uses a guillotine made of flour, a byproduct of the Execution of Light spell. It seems that he knew something about Touma`s Imagine Breaker, but it was never revealed. He also learns of his memory loss during a fight with him. He is later killed by Acqua near the end of the 14th novel.

character.name: Hamazura Shiage
character.description: Hamazura Shiage is a former Skill-Out who accidentally gets caught up with the Dark side of Academy City.He is first introduced in the Side Story novels where he became the leader of his Skill-Out gang after Accelerator killed the former leader by orders of the Board of Directors. However, on the same day he became the new leader, his gang was hired to kill Mikoto`s mother, Misuzu but were defeated by Touma and Accelerator. Humiliated, he left the gang to his friend Hattori Hanzo and became a chauffeur and informant for Team ITEM where he fell in love with Rikou. During the 15th novel, he betrays and fights ITEM`s leader Shizuri Mugino to protect Rikou and defeats her. However, his actions interfere with Aleister`s plans as he`s a rogue anomaly, so Aleister sends his assassins to eliminate him. Ironically, he is saved by Shizuri, who now has a sense of twisted love for him (declaring she will castrate him as her sign of affection) and lets him and Rikou escape Academy City who escaped stealing a jet since she doesn`t wants nobody else to interfere with her hunt. After he and Rikou jump out of their jet, they end up in a warzone in Russia where he is forced to fight Academy City mercenaries along with some villagers until they are saved by Acqua of the Back. He and Rikou later heads to Elizarina to find refuge there where Rikou is partially healed by Accelerator and fights alongside with Elizarinian soldiers and aiding Acqua. He later heads towards a nuclear military base (the same plant that Mikoto and Misaka 10777 are going) to protect a document called the Kremlin Report but he and Rikou gets caught up in an attack by Academy City forces and is then intercepted by Shizuri. But Shizuri collapses for using Body Clear and later makes the peace with Shiage and Rikou and joins them after learning about a secret document called the Parameter List which reveals the Academy City administration has been secretly interfering with the Power Curriculum Program and preventing most of the city`s students from gaining or raising their powers. After the Third World War, Shiage is given amnesty and the assassination order on him removed and with the help of Accelerator, after he makes a deal with the City`s administration to not expose the truth about the Parameter List where he along with Rikou and Shizuri returns to Academy City and reforms Team ITEM. However, he and Accelerator actions have made them enemies with a new group of espers called the "Freshmen" who are aware of the existences of Magic and sees them as an obstacle in Academy City`s war against the Magic factions. After being helped by Touma and Leivinia Bardway against the "Freshmen", the latter invites him to join the Magic world. As a Skill-Out gangster, he follows the gangs rules of not hurting innocents. While not nice or idealistic, he is smart yet acts on his own desires. In battle, he prefers to avoid fighting or to finish the fight as quickly as possible. He gets very embarrassed on sex-related issues.

character.name: Gakuen Toshi
character.description: Gakuen Toshi, or Academy City, is a city of several schools and institutions of higher learning from kindergarten to university level that learn side-by-side along with the scientists who research on psychic powers and higher technology, the latter being one of the primary reasons for its establishment. It is the most advanced city in the world and its technology is said to be 30 years ahead of what`s `outside` of it.

character.name: Gabriel
character.description: Gabriel is an archangel that appears during the Angel Fall Incident. It first appeared under the name Misha Croitsef while inhabiting Sasha Croitsef`s body.

character.name: Frenda Seivelun
character.description: Frenda Seivelun is a member of ITEM. She makes use of a tape of explosive material and an electronic device to create a fuse that can cut through various objects. Usually the fuses are connected to dolls with explosives within them.

character.name: Takitsubo Rikou
character.description: Takitsubo Rikou is a member of ITEM. Her ability is called AIM Stalker (能力追跡, Nouryoku Tsuiseki) which she uses to track down espers by memorizing their AIM fields. Her ability also allows her to steal other espers` abilities by memorizing their AIM, potentially allowing her to become the eighth Level 5 esper in Academy City.

character.name: Kinuhata Saiai
character.description: Kinuhata Saiai is a member of ITEM. Her ability is the Level 4 Offense Armour (窒素装甲, Chisso Soukou), which she uses to control the nitrogen in the atmosphere and create a few centimeters barrier of nitrogen that she can use to attack and defend.

character.name: Mugino Shizuri
character.description: Mugino Shizuri is one of the seven Level 5 espers, ranking fourth after Misaka Mikoto, she is the leader of ITEM, which is at odds with SCHOOL. She looks down upon lower-level espers and does not mind eliminating people who get in her way or go against her, regardless of whether they are enemies or allies. Her power can create multiple beams that can sear through objects, or she can defend herself by creating a shield of energy. She can also use silicon cards to split her attacks into multiple blasts.

character.name: Level 5
character.description: Within Academy City, the Level 5s are the most powerful psychics in the city. The following are the currently known Level 5s; ranked not by strength but by how useful they are to http://anidb.net/ch2731 [Aleister]`s plans. 1.) http://anidb.net/ch10527 [Accelerator] 2.) http://anidb.net/ch98257 [Kakine Teitoku] 3.) http://anidb.net/ch2469 [Misaka Mikoto] 4.) http://anidb.net/ch56199 [Mugino Shizuri] 5.) http://anidb.net/ch54960 [Shokuhou Misaki] 6.) Unknown. A possible impersonator claiming to be Aihana Etsu has appeared. 7.) http://anidb.net/ch107656 [Sogiita Gunha]

character.name: Roshia Seikyou
character.description: The Russian Orthodox Church is the largest of the Orthodox Churches and one of the three world`s largest Christian organizations.

character.name: School
character.description: SCHOOL is an http://anidb.net/ch34367 [Academy City]-based organization led by http://anidb.net/ch98257 [Kakine Teitoku].

character.name: Block
character.description: BLOCK is an http://anidb.net/ch34367 [Academy City]-based organization whose original goal was to keep an eye on the level of cooperation from friendly institutions outside of the city. Source: Toaru Majutsu no Index Wiki

character.name: Member
character.description: MEMBER is an http://anidb.net/ch34367 [Academy City]-based organization that answers directly to General Superintendent http://anidb.net/ch2731 [Aleister Crowley]. Source: Toaru Majutsu no Index Wiki

character.name: Oushitsu-ha
character.description: Oushitsu-ha (Royal Family Faction) is one of the three primary political factions that control the state of the United Kingdom through the check and balances they maintain with each other. Source: Toaru Majutsu no Index Wiki

character.name: Gakuen Toshi Toukatsu Rijikai
character.description: The Academy City Board of Directors consists of 12 people who hold absolute authority in Academy City, with only the Board Chairman, Aleister Crowley, above them. Source: Toaru Majutsu no Index Wiki

character.name: United Kingdom
character.description: In the United Kingdom, three organizations rule Britain`s magical affairs. Each three represent a part of Britain`s Magical community. Due the joint ruling between the three organizations, they have made Britain one of the most powerful magical organization in the world, rivaling the Catholic Church. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Majutsu Kessha Aratanaru Hikari
character.description: New Light is a magic organization based in the United Kingdom, which specializes in Norse-based magic.They were hired to work as couriers by the second princess of England, http://anidb.net/ch98252 [Carissa], they later change sides at the climax of the British Halloween and are apparently still free to operate as an organization.Source: Toaru Wiki

character.name: Leivinia Birdway
character.description: Leivinia Birdway is the haughty and powerful boss of the largest magic cabal in London, the Dawn-colored Sunlight. She is the catalyst to the involvement of several science side characters into the magic side, just so she can contend against GREMLIN. Source: Toaru Wiki

character.name: Mark Space
character.description: Mark Space is a member of the Dawn-Colored Sunlight magic cabal, he is a loyal assistant of http://anidb.net/ch101834 [Leivinia Birdway] and a magician who specializes in using the Minor Arcana of Tarot Cards to perform elemental spells. Source: Toaru Wiki

episode.title: とある魔術の禁書目録ⅢティザーPV
PV1: A Certain Magical Index 3 Teaser trailer (0:45)
Toaru Majutsu no Index III Teaser PV
コミケ94PV / A Certain Magical Index 3 trailer
PV2: Comiket 94 PV / A Certain Magical Index 3 Trailer (1:23)
Comiket 94 PV / A Certain Magical Index 3 Trailer
混乱
Unrest
En crise
Konran
episode.summary: Following the September 30th Kazakiri incident, protests against Academy City erupt across Europe, and things are restless within the city, as well. Kamijo must stay after school as punishment after getting into a fight with his classmates. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神の右席
The Right Seat of God
Le siège à la droite de Dieu
Kami no Migi Seki
episode.summary: Kamijo is separated from Tsuchimikado, but ends up finding the Amakusa Church`s Itsuwa. She informs Kamijo about the circumstances of the Papal Palace of Avignon, and its link to the turmoil being incited around the world. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: C文書
The Document of C
L`archive C
C Bunsho
episode.summary: Confronted by Terra, Kamijo and Itsuwa have their hands full trying to avoid his attacks. Military forces from Academy City appear in Avignon, suppressing the demonstrators. Terra uncovers the secret Kamijo has been hiding. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 学園都市暗部
The Dark Side of Academy City
La face sombre de la Cité
Gakuen Toshi Anbu
episode.summary: Tsuchimikado apprehends an underworld arms broker, and a search of his apartment leads to information about an assassination plot. But there is more to the scheme than it originally appears, as several other teams go into action. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 垣根帝督[ダークマター]
Dark Matter
Dark Matter
Dark Matter
episode.summary: Accelerator continues on his way to the satellite control center, but is blocked by Saraku, a MEMBER agent. The BLOCK team, with the help of 5000 hired mercenaries, attempts to break into a heavily-fortified municipal facility. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 超能力者達
Super-espers
Les espers
Chounouryokusha-tachi
episode.summary: While Hamazura is out running errands for Mugino, SCHOOL stages an attack on ITEM. When Mugino runs from Kakine, Takitsubo offers to protect Hamazura, but ends up needing his help instead. Kakine issues a challenge to Accelerator. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第三階層
The Third Level
Le troisième niveau
Dai San Kaisou
episode.summary: A threat from Acqua against Kamijo leads Itsuwa to come to Academy City as his live-in bodyguard. Index, Kamijo and Itsuwa visit a spa in the third level of the complex beneath the 22nd School District. Mikoto frets over Kamijo`s amnesia. source: Crunchyroll

episode.title: 聖人崩し
Saint Breakout
Le Briseur de saint
Seijin Kuzushi
episode.summary: With Kamijo unconscious, Itsuwa is guilt-ridden, and receives a pep talk from Tatemiya. As Orsola researches Acqua`s past, the Amakusa Church members make their stand against Acqua, at which Itsuwa reveals their new secret weapon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 『とあるエキスポ』-SPステージ- 生中継
Episode S3
"Toaru Expo" SP Stage: Namachuukei
聖母崇拝
Holy Mother Veneration
Le culte de la Vierge
Seibo Suihai
episode.summary: Kanzaki battles Acqua under Academy City, but finds herself overpowered by his might. Mikoto runs into Kamijo after he sneaks out of his hospital room. Kanzaki works with the Amakusa Church members to find a way to beat Acqua. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スカイバス365
Sky Bus 365
Sky Bus 365
Sky Bus 365
episode.summary: Itsuwa and Kanzaki both up the ante in their pursuit of Kamijo. Index and Kamijo are summoned to Britain to deal with a magic issue, but while en route, their jet falls victim to a terrorist plot that threatens the lives of everyone aboard. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 英国迷路
British Labyrinth
Le labyrinthe anglais
Eikoku Meiro
episode.summary: After being escorted to London, Kamijo and Index have an audience with the queen and three princesses to discuss the threats facing Britain. Upon dividing into separate teams, Kamijo assists with tracking down the members of New Light. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 傭兵
Mercenary
Le mercenaire
Youhei
episode.summary: As the coup continues, even the sisters of the puritan church are targeted, while the queen and princesses find their lives in danger. Index analyzes the evidence of the Eurotunnel blast. Knight Leader is confronted by a former colleague. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カーテナ＝オリジナル
Curtana Original
Curtana Original
Curtana Original
episode.summary: Acqua and Knight Leader continue their fateful showdown in the forest. Princess Carissa reveals a devastating new technique using Curtana Original. When Kamijo and Index`s lives are endangered, an unexpected ally comes to their rescue. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 英雄達
Heroes
Les héros
Eiyuu-tachi
episode.summary: Kamijo, Kanzaki, Index, and Vilian head toward Buckingham Palace to stop Carissa. The palace is bombarded from the floating fortress Coven Compass, and others join the battle when Carissa calls in her own cruise missile strike. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 迎電部隊[スパークシグナル]
Spark Signal
Spark Signal
Spark Signal
episode.summary: Accelerator and the other members of GROUP are assigned to eliminate the members of Spark Signal, a terrorist group which has taken hostages. Hamazura and Kinuhata find themselves on the run when they defy the city`s higher-ups. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 統括理事会
The Governing Board
Le Comité de direction
Toukatsu Rijikai
episode.summary: Hamazura desperately tries to rescue Takitsubo when the building she is in falls under terrorist attack. Stephanie hunts down Kinuhata to exact revenge for Sunazara. Accelerator seeks out assistance from an unlikely benefactor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怪物[ドラゴン]
Dragon
Dragon
Dragon
episode.summary: Técpatl and Unabara square off in Shiokishi`s chambers, while Accelerator and Sugitani face each other in the hallway outside. Kinuhata discovers the true reason for the current assault against herself, Takitsubo, and Hamazura. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 独立国同盟
The Alliance of Independent Nations
L`Alliance des Nations Indépendantes
Dokuritsukoku Doumei
episode.summary: Tensions escalate as Russia threatens military action against Academy City, while French sorcerers storm the English Channel. Kamijo and Lessar`s search for Sasha Kruezhev leads them to the Elizalina Alliance of Independent Nations. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 番外個体[ミサカワースト]
Misaka Worst
Misaka Worst
Misaka Worst
episode.summary: After dealing with the sorcerers at the Russian airbase, Accelerator has a Misaka clone skydive down to confront him. Vento challenges Fiamma while Kamijo and the others watch on. Hamazura gets some disturbing news from Digurv. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 守る理由
A Reason to Protect
Une raison de protéger
Mamoru Riyuu
